The genteel companion being exact directions for the recorder : with a collection of the best and newest tunes and grounds extant / carefully composed and gathered by Humphry Salter. Salter, Humphrey.
[5], 8, [50] p. : ill., music.
Printed for Richard Hunt and Humphry Salter at the Lute in St. Pauls Church-Yard, London : 1683.
Includes "Directions for the recorder" on 8 p. and [50] p. of music. Reproduction of original in: Library of Congress.
